name: Bug Simulator (Wowie GameJam 3.0)
description:
Ever wondered why your programms are so buggy sometimes? Its because of the "buggers". wonder what they are? maybe see what their Job is? Well, you can do it here! 

In this GameJam Game you are a "bugger" and your task is to bug out the Scripts that you are given. And you can do that by dragging the code out of the function and into another function, or just leaving all the functions empty. There are 10 levels in this Game Jam Game, from breaking the Hello World code to  killing the player when you go up or getting moved down when you hit a spike, the possibilities are endless*

*(Possibilities are not endless and are dependent on what functions and what code blocks you get. )

Controls:

  • Mouse Movement (left click and dragging)
  • Keyboard keys  (when a function needs to run)

Made for the WOWIE GameJam 3.0

The Game fits to the theme because you actively make programmers loose their code so you can make more progress
